offerText.qualificationTextPart1: When you make 4 purchases of $40 or more on fuel within the month of May at Esso or Mobil Stations

details.legalText: Make 4 purchases of $40 or more on fuel at participating Esso or Mobil stations in Canada, and swipe or scan the PC Optimum card or key in the registered phone number associated with the PC Optimum account receiving this offer at the time of purchase to earn the points indicated. We are not obligated to award points based on errors or misprints. PC Optimum points are redeemable at PC Optimum affiliated grocery stores and Shoppers Drug Mart locations. Minimum redemption 10,000 points. No cash value. Visit pcoptimum.ca for full terms & conditions for redemption restrictions. Allow up to 72 hours for points to be awarded. Esso is a trademark of Imperial Oil Limited. Imperial Oil, licensee.  Mobil is a trademark of Exxon Mobil Corporation or one of its subsidiaries. Imperial Oil, licensee
details.productTextLong: Offer applicable to all grades of gasoline and diesel

details.legalText: Offer expires after one use. We reserve the right to limit quantities. We are not obligated to award points based on errors or misprints. Points issued on the net pre-tax purchase total of eligible products exclusively at Shoppers Drug Mart/Pharmaprix, after redemptions and discounts (excludes purchase of tobacco, lottery tickets, alcohol, gift cards, prepaid card products, transit/event tickets, post office transactions, passport photos and any products which are provincially regulated or as we determine from time to time). Canâ€™t be used with any other promotions or offers. No cash value. Minimum redemption 10,000 points. See terms & conditions for details and full list of exclusions.
details.productTextLong: Almost anything in-store. Certain restrictions apply. This offer cannot be combined with department or total store offers. Customers will automatically receive the best of the available offers should they qualify.  Offer can only be redeemed at Shoppers Drug Mart, Pharmaprix, Shoppers Home Health Care or Wellwise. Offer cannot be used in conjunction with employee discount or any other promotional offer.

details.legalText: Spend $30 or more after all coupons and discounts are deducted and before taxes in a single transaction. Product availability may vary by store. We are not obligated to award points based on errors or misprints. No cash value. Minimum redemption 10,000 points. See terms & conditions for redemption restrictions.
details.productTextLong: Sunscreen and tanning products. Offer can only be redeemed at Shoppers Drug Mart or Pharmaprix.

details.legalText: For every $2 spent on the items indicated before applicable taxes and after all coupons and discounts are deducted, in a single transaction at any participating store location operating under the Loblaws Inc. and Shoppers Drug Mart Inc. banners, you will earn the points indicated. Product availability may vary by store. We are not obligated to award points based on errors or misprints. No cash value. Minimum redemption 10,000 points. See terms & conditions for redemption restrictions.

Offer valid at participating stores location operating under the Loblaws Inc. and Shoppers Drug Mart Inc. banners.  Offer expires after one use and cannot be used in subsequent transactions. Product availability may vary by store. We reserve the right to limit quantities. We are not obligated to award points based on errors or misprints. Points apply to items sold as individual units, and are not awarded per unit when the unit is part of a case pack or variety pack. No cash value. Minimum redemption 10,000 points. See terms & Conditions for redemption restrictions.
